extendedInfo.description: A simple to use measurement unit converter.- Allows you to see possible unit conversions of different units all at once.- Shows full and symbolic unit names.1.1 - 574 Units in 58 Categories.  Please uninstall the old version before installing this version.1.2 - Numeric keypad displayed by default.  And there was much rejoicing in the land.1.3 - New torque and distance conversions, new area (Ping).  Default keyboard switched BACK to Alpha until I fix a bug in my handling code (sorry-hopefully I'll fix it soon).1.4 - Updated to display on tablets in fullscreen mode. With this release ConvertDroid no longer supports Android 1.5. IF YOU ARE RUNNING 1.5 DO NOT UPGRADE TO THIS VERSION!!!

reviews.title: Simply the best.
reviews.comment: Nothing else I\'ve seen comes close. The most comprehensive list of conversions ever. Easy to use; a must have app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: No distractions in the UI. Any conversion you may ever need and a dozen more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The only one I\'ll ever use
reviews.comment: Best and never had any problem with each updates...
reviews.author: Saravana Kumar

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Been using this since cupcake 1.6, reliable and easy to use. Does the job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Maybe the best converter I\'ve ever seen
reviews.author: Vitali Samurov

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: Easy to use and works well.

reviews.title: Simply the best

reviews.title: Engineering saviour
reviews.comment: Provides pretty much all the conversions I need as an engineering student.  One persistent gripe is that the numeric keypad isn\'t activated by default.
reviews.author: Dan Chowdhury

reviews.comment: Got everything and more that I\'ll ever need to convert. Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Best unit converter.
reviews.comment: The best unitconverter. Works well on my galaxy tab & phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really like this app, no permissions and free too
reviews.comment: This application works very well, has zero permissions and is free.  What more could one ask!  No glitches on my device, I love it and use it often.  Please, don\'t change a thing!
reviews.author: Marco Alessandrini

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Simple n sweet,  and work well
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best I found
reviews.comment: Tried several but this one i find to be the most comprehensive, with a functional interface.
reviews.author: Gaurav Prashar

reviews.comment: One gripe.  Doesnt convert Atmospheres to feet,  meters or Bars of depth.  Need this as a dive watch collector
reviews.author: kim bosotina

reviews.title: Keyboard
reviews.comment: Only issue - when entering data, would make more sense to default to number pad than letters keyboard layout
reviews.author: Tom Lake

reviews.title: A super App.
reviews.comment: Thanks guys!!
reviews.author: Terry Matney

reviews.title: ok
reviews.comment: serves its purpose

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Haven\'t installed others, but I\'ve been extremely happy with this one. It has more tables than most of us will ever need or have use for. Easy to use, accurate data, extensive information. Great app...thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect...
reviews.comment: Get that number pad fixed and let user decide what conversions you want to see and it will literally be that app 4 conversions! No ads & every conversion imaginable! Thank you so much!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Screen size
reviews.comment: Possibly get to fit larger screen (ie RAZR) instead of scrolling.. except for that excellent app
reviews.author: A Google User
